name: US 64/Laura Duncan Road Interchange
description: Major interchange improvements to reduce congestion and improve safety at the US 64 and Laura Duncan Road intersection. Project includes new ramp configurations and signal upgrades.

name: Downtown Streetscape Phase 2
description: Continuation of downtown streetscape improvements including new sidewalks, street furniture, lighting, and landscaping along Salem Street from Center Street to Saunders Street.

name: Apex Nature Park Expansion
description: Expansion of Apex Nature Park to include new trails, picnic shelters, playground equipment, and improved parking facilities. Adds 25 acres to the existing park.

name: Water Treatment Plant Upgrade
description: Upgrade water treatment capacity from 12 MGD to 16 MGD to meet projected growth demands. Includes new filtration systems and chemical feed improvements.

name: Fire Station #4
description: New fire station to serve the growing southwestern portion of Apex. Includes apparatus bays, living quarters, training facilities, and emergency operations space.

name: Beaver Creek Greenway Extension
description: Extension of the Beaver Creek Greenway from the American Tobacco Trail connection south to Kelly Road, adding 2.3 miles of paved multi-use path.

name: Stormwater Infrastructure - Olive Chapel Basin
description: Major stormwater improvements in the Olive Chapel basin to address recurring flooding issues. Includes culvert replacements, channel improvements, and new detention facilities.

name: Town Hall Renovation
description: Comprehensive renovation of Town Hall to improve energy efficiency, ADA accessibility, and workspace functionality. Includes HVAC replacement and roof repairs.

name: Wastewater System Rehabilitation
description: Rehabilitation and replacement of aging sewer lines in the historic downtown area. Includes slip-lining, pipe bursting, and manhole rehabilitation.

name: Community Park Athletic Complex
description: New athletic complex featuring four multi-use fields, restroom facilities, concessions, and parking. Designed to host regional tournaments.

name: Intelligent Traffic Signal System
description: Implementation of adaptive signal control technology at 25 key intersections to improve traffic flow and reduce congestion. Includes fiber connectivity and central management system.

name: Public Safety Training Facility
description: Joint training facility for Fire and Police departments. Includes driving course, burn building, shooting range, and classroom space.

name: Kelly Road Widening
description: Widening Kelly Road from two to four lanes between Apex Barbecue Road and Ten Ten Road. Includes bike lanes, sidewalks, and intersection improvements.

name: Recycling Center Expansion
description: Expansion of the municipal recycling center to add additional material processing capacity and improve traffic flow.

name: Apex Peakway Segment D
description: Final segment of the Apex Peakway connecting NC 55 to US 1. Critical for relieving traffic congestion in central Apex.
